message: I have a unique opportunity for you to acquire a valuable product. I'm willing to sell it to you for $18,000. This is a one-time offer, and I'm confident you won't find a better deal elsewhere.
Alice, that price is a bit high for me. I'm interested, but  $10,000 is more in line with my budget.

I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, but I'm not willing to go as low as $10,000. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $14,000. This is a compromise that I think is fair considering the product's value.
I appreciate you meeting me a bit closer, Alice.  How about we settle at $11,000?
I'm not quite ready to settle at $11,000. I'm willing to make one more concession, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm thinking of $13,500. This is as low as I'm willing to go.
